# HumanBodyPoseObservation.JointsGroupName.leftLeg

**Case**

A group name that represents the left leg.

## Declaration

```swift
case leftLeg
```

## Getting the group names

- **HumanBodyPoseObservation.JointsGroupName.face**: A group name that represents the face.
- **HumanBodyPoseObservation.JointsGroupName.leftArm**: A group name that represents left arm.
- **HumanBodyPoseObservation.JointsGroupName.rightArm**: A group name that represents the right arm.
- **HumanBodyPoseObservation.JointsGroupName.rightLeg**: A group name that represents the right leg.
- **HumanBodyPoseObservation.JointsGroupName.torso**: A group name that represents the torso.
